name: ENFORCER-209
description:
This is a short project I made in a month for the  Touch the Stars Game Jam 

It was my first time using MZ and the new way of doing animations, plus learning to use new plugins, took some getting used to, but I ended up loving the engine by the end. 

The game is a combination of different things that I love. I took inspiration from things like Robocop and Judge Dredd but also a bit from old samurai and western movies. I put a lot of passion into this one and I hope you enjoy playing it. 

WARNING: The game contains flashing lights and may potentially trigger seizures for people with photosensitive epilepsy. 

Fullscreen mode = F4
